Subbed Projects.Show Name: Miyamoto Musashi: Souken ni Haseru Yume

Good Comments: Typos and untranslated text on screen.
Bad Comments: This isn't the official Frostii release, script full of errors such as "captivated" instead of "captured", "nengligble" and "ransome". Typesetting is soft-subbed and frequently cut-off or missing.
